name: BayOnei
description:
This game will eventually become a 3v3 first to 10 elimination type of game. At the start of the round you will be able to pick you player similar to Overwatch/Valorant. These players will have a set of abilities that yo can use. At the start of each round you will be able to change player. Once you die in a round you will not respawn until last player/players remain on one team, they will be declared the winners for that round. First team to reach 10 wins, wins the game. If both teams reach 9 wins the match will continue and becomes win by 2, if they reach round 20 it is automatically declared a draw.

This game is still in progress, if you want to see what I will try to add and want to follow along you can either look at my devlog here on itch.io or go to my trello
